name: @akashic/pdi-browser
description: An akashic-pdi implementatation for Web browsers

scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: npm run clean:ts && npm run testem:after
scripts.build: npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:bundle && npm run compile:minify
scripts.build:full: npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:bundle:full && npm run compile:minify:full
scripts.build:canvas: npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:bundle:canvas && npm run compile:minify:canvas
scripts.compile:bundle: npm run compile:bundle:full && npm run compile:bundle:canvas
scripts.compile:bundle:canvas: npm run compile:bundle:canvas:prepare && shx mkdir -p build && browserify -r ./lib/canvas/index.js:@akashic/pdi-browser -x @akashic/akashic-engine -d | exorcist ./build/pdi-browser.canvas.js.map > ./build/pdi-browser.canvas.js
scripts.compile:minify: npm run compile:minify:full && npm run compile:minify:canvas
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:md

author: DWANGO Co., Ltd.
